titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B33_02
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B33_02

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

div.tei:ab:
Text preserved in this squeeze:
1.ldḫ | w-b-mʾy | ʿqbh | ṣlwtn | w-ynlw | ʾnṯht | w-qdmy-ʾy | ʾhl | ʾmn 2.rs | ʿm-smn | bn | ʾhl | ʾmnhtn | w-ynkr | hnlhm | bhṯ | bn | ḏbḥ(h)[y] 3.w-bhnt-sm | ʾndrr | ywm | hl-ʾy | bn-m | ʾnṯhtn | ʾn | wrdt | b-ʾ(n) 4.d | ʿṯr | w-nmy | ḏbḥ-s | l-ʾy | stmẓʾ | hn | yśqn | w-bhṯ | b-ʿṯtr | 5.ʿn | w-bhnt-sm | ʾhl | ysʿrbn | ʿṯr | ʾndrr | ywm | hl | bn-m-ʾy 6.dnn | ʿṯtr | ʾn | tʾnṯnn | ywm-m | trd | ḏt | tʾnṯ | ʿṯtr | w-sʾr 7.b-ṣltn | bn | bṯ | l-gzz | ḏn | ftḥn | ywmnt | ftḥn | w-mṯbtn | s 8.rt | ḏ-kbrh | hwfʾl | ḏ-wkl | qdmn | kbr-s | smʿm | yʾwsʾl | (b) 9.n | w-yʾwsʾl | bn | hnʾ | ḏ-gnd | w-wlw | w-ʿthd | w-stwqh | sm 10.[ḏ-g](nd | w-rf)[zn] (| b-ṣḥfh | ʾsmʿh-smn | w-wf)[..](hn |) [w](fy |)
Restored full text of the inscription:
[... ... ...] 1.ldḫ | w-b-mʾy | ʿqbh | ṣlwtn | w-ynlw | ʾnṯht | w-qdmy-ʾy | ʾhl | ʾmn[htn w-ʾsd | st=] 2.rs | ʿm-smn | bn | ʾhl | ʾmnhtn | w-ynkr | hnlhm | bhṯ | bn | ḏbḥ(h)[y | ysʿrb | mʿn] 3.w-bhnt-sm | ʾndrr | ywm | hl-ʾy | bn-m | ʾnṯhtn | ʾn | wrdt | b-ʾ(n)[ṯ-s | mty-m | tr=] 4.d | ʿṯr | w-nmy | ḏbḥ-s | l-ʾy | stmẓʾ | hn | yśqn | w-bhṯ | b-ʿṯtr | [bn | ʾḏbḥh | m=] 5.ʿn | w-bhnt-sm | ʾhl | ysʿrbn | ʿṯr | ʾndrr | ywm | hl | bn-m-ʾy [| ʾnṯ*ht*y | tr=] 6.dnn | ʿṯtr | ʾn | tʾnṯnn | ywm-m | trd | ḏt | tʾnṯ | ʿṯtr | w-sʾr-[ʾy | ḏ-ngw | k-sm] 7.b-ṣltn | bn | bṯ | l-gzz | ḏn | ftḥn | ywmnt | ftḥn | w-mṯbtn | s[dṯ | ṭʿn | ḏ-ʾṯ=] 8.rt | ḏ-kbrh | hwfʾl | ḏ-wkl | qdmn | kbr-s | smʿm | yʾwsʾl | (b)[n | šrḥ | ḏ-rfz=] 9.n | w-yʾwsʾl | bn | hnʾ | ḏ-gnd | w-wlw | w-ʿthd | w-stwqh | sm[ʿy | ḏn | ftḥn] 10.[ḏ-g](nd | w-rf)[zn] (| b-ṣḥfh | ʾsmʿh-smn | w-wf)[..](hn |) [w](fy |)

Text preserved in this squeeze:
1.[…] in accordance with the document of the legal appeal, and the women and the leaders of the (temple) 2.serve with them among the (temple) staff have obtained (an offering). And he shall impose punishments if the sacrifices 3.and their daughters at ʾAndarar are not sufficient; (this) on the day on which some of the women coupled with him as 4.[the coup]ling with ʿAththar took place and the sacrifice to him increased, to the point that it sufficed. If they amass and increase 5.and their daughters to ʿAththar at ʾAndarar when some of the 6.with ʿAthtar, they shall become his wives; (this) on the day on which the one who will become wife of ʿAthtar shall couple (with him). And all the rest 7.in the legal appeal within what has been proclaimed for the enforcement of this judicial decision. The date of the judicial decision and document is 8.rat during the kabīrate of Hawafīʾīl Dhū-Wakīl, his first kabīrate. The witnesses were Yaʾawsʾīl 9.n and Yaʾawsʾīl bin Hāniʾ Dhū-Ganad. And the two [... ... ...] were (thus) entrusted, and they dealt with (the matter) and remained responsible, (namely) 10.Dhū-Ganad and Rafzān, by the writing of their witnesses [... ...].
Restored full text of the inscription:
[... ...] 1.[…] in accordance with the document of the legal appeal, and the women and the leaders of the (temple) [staff and those who] 2.serve with them among the (temple) staff have obtained (an offering). And he shall impose punishments if the sacrifices [offered by the Minaeans] 3.and their daughters at ʾAndarar are not sufficient; (this) on the day on which some of the women coupled with him as [his] wives, [while] 4.[the coup]ling with ʿAththar took place and the sacrifice to him increased, to the point that it sufficed. If they amass and increase [the offerings of the Mina]eans 5.and their daughters to ʿAththar at ʾAndarar when some of the [women will couple] 6.with ʿAthtar, they shall become his wives; (this) on the day on which the one who will become wife of ʿAthtar shall couple (with him). And all the rest [which has been decreed for them] 7.in the legal appeal within what has been proclaimed for the enforcement of this judicial decision. The date of the judicial decision and document is the six[th of the last decade of Dhū-ʾAthī-] 8.rat during the kabīrate of Hawafīʾīl Dhū-Wakīl, his first kabīrate. The witnesses were Yaʾawsʾīl bi[n Sharaḥ Dhū-Rafzā-] 9.n and Yaʾawsʾīl bin Hāniʾ Dhū-Ganad. And the two wit[nesses of this decree] were (thus) entrusted, and they dealt with (the matter) and remained responsible, (namely) 10.Dhū-Ganad and Rafzān, by the writing of their witnesses [... ...].

Text preserved in this squeeze:
… in accordance with the document of the legal appeal, and the women and the leaders of the temple
serve with them among the temple staff have obtained an offering. And he shall impose punishments if the sacrifices
and their daughters at ʾAndarar are not sufficient; this on the day on which some of the women coupled with him as
the coupling with ʿAththar took place and the sacrifice to him increased, to the point that it sufficed. If they amass and increase
and their daughters to ʿAththar at ʾAndarar when some of the
with ʿAthtar, they shall become his wives; this on the day on which the one who will become wife of ʿAthtar shall couple with him. And all the rest
in the legal appeal within what has been proclaimed for the enforcement of this judicial decision. The date of the judicial decision and document is
rat during the kabīrate of Hawafīʾīl Dhū-Wakīl, his first kabīrate. The witnesses were Yaʾawsʾīl
n and Yaʾawsʾīl bin Hāniʾ Dhū-Ganad. And the two ... were thus entrusted, and they dealt with the matter and remained responsible, namely
Dhū-Ganad and Rafzān, by the writing of their witnesses
.
Restored full text of the inscription:
… in accordance with the document of the legal appeal, and the women and the leaders of the temple staff and those who
serve with them among the temple staff have obtained an offering. And he shall impose punishments if the sacrifices offered by the Minaeans
and their daughters at ʾAndarar are not sufficient; this on the day on which some of the women coupled with him as his wives, while
the coupling with ʿAththar took place and the sacrifice to him increased, to the point that it sufficed. If they amass and increase the offerings of the Minaeans
and their daughters to ʿAththar at ʾAndarar when some of the women will couple
with ʿAthtar, they shall become his wives; this on the day on which the one who will become wife of ʿAthtar shall couple with him. And all the rest which has been decreed for them
in the legal appeal within what has been proclaimed for the enforcement of this judicial decision. The date of the judicial decision and document is the sixth of the last decade of Dhū-ʾAthī-
rat during the kabīrate of Hawafīʾīl Dhū-Wakīl, his first kabīrate. The witnesses were Yaʾawsʾīl bin Sharaḥ Dhū-Rafzā-
n and Yaʾawsʾīl bin Hāniʾ Dhū-Ganad. And the two witnesses of this decree were thus entrusted, and they dealt with the matter and remained responsible, namely
Dhū-Ganad and Rafzān, by the writing of their witnesses
.

Text preserved in this squeeze:

in the legal appeal within what has been proclaimed for the enforcement of this judicial decision. The date of the judicial decision and document is

n and Yaʾawsʾīl bin Hāniʾ Dhū-Ganad. And the two ... were thus entrusted, and they dealt with the matter and remained responsible, namely
Dhū-Ganad and Rafzān, by the writing of their witnesses .
Restored full text of the inscription:
… in accordance with the document of the legal appeal, and the women and the leaders of the temple staff and those who
serve with them among the temple staff have obtained an offering. And he shall impose punishments if the sacrifices offered by the Minaeans
and their daughters at ʾAndarar are not sufficient; this on the day on which some of the women coupled with him as his wives, while
the coupling with ʿAththar took place and the sacrifice to him increased, to the point that it sufficed. If they amass and increase the offerings of the Minaeans
and their daughters to ʿAththar at ʾAndarar when some of the women will couple
with ʿAthtar, they shall become his wives; this on the day on which the one who will become wife of ʿAthtar shall couple with him. And all the rest which has been decreed for them
in the legal appeal within what has been proclaimed for the enforcement of this judicial decision. The date of the judicial decision and document is the sixth of the last decade of Dhū-ʾAthī-
rat during the kabīrate of Hawafīʾīl Dhū-Wakīl, his first kabīrate. The witnesses were Yaʾawsʾīl bin Sharaḥ Dhū-Rafzā-
n and Yaʾawsʾīl bin Hāniʾ Dhū-Ganad. And the two witnesses of this decree were thus entrusted, and they dealt with the matter and remained responsible, namely
Dhū-Ganad and Rafzān, by the writing of their witnesses .

… in accordance with the document of the legal appeal, and the women and the leaders of the temple staff and those who
serve with them among the temple staff have obtained an offering. And he shall impose punishments if the sacrifices offered by the Minaeans
and their daughters at ʾAndarar are not sufficient; this on the day on which some of the women coupled with him as his wives, while
the coupling with ʿAththar took place and the sacrifice to him increased, to the point that it sufficed. If they amass and increase the offerings of the Minaeans
and their daughters to ʿAththar at ʾAndarar when some of the women will couple
with ʿAthtar, they shall become his wives; this on the day on which the one who will become wife of ʿAthtar shall couple with him. And all the rest which has been decreed for them
in the legal appeal within what has been proclaimed for the enforcement of this judicial decision. The date of the judicial decision and document is the sixth of the last decade of Dhū-ʾAthī-
rat during the kabīrate of Hawafīʾīl Dhū-Wakīl, his first kabīrate. The witnesses were Yaʾawsʾīl bin Sharaḥ Dhū-Rafzā-
n and Yaʾawsʾīl bin Hāniʾ Dhū-Ganad. And the two witnesses of this decree were thus entrusted, and they dealt with the matter and remained responsible, namely
Dhū-Ganad and Rafzān, by the writing of their witnesses .
